Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by West Texas in 1973...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1973, off Darrell Muldoon (PON)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/1973, off Owen Reaves (CI)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Troy on 4/3/1975...
Drove in 6 runs against Troy on 4/20/1978...
Drove in 7 runs against Boston (UBA) on 5/8/1978...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1978, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Wisconsin on 2/11/1979 to a 3-year deal worth $13,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1979, hitting .391 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Malibu on 4/22/1980...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/8/1982 to a 5-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
Injured on 6/14/1982 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
